casebody.data:
First District.

Leon Davidson, plaintiff in error, v. Sears Community State Bank, defendant in error.Gen. No. 36,634.Opinion filed March 5, 1934.Heard in the first division of this court for the first district at the April term, 1933.Ben A. Stewart and Sidney Rothblatt, for plaintiff in error; Ode L. Rankin and Ben A. Stewart, of counsel. Lederer, Livingston, Kahn & Adler, for defendant in error. Mr. Presiding Justice Matchett

delivered the opinion of the court.
